actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the burial at the Arlington Memorial Amphitheater, Arlington National Cemetery, Va., of the remains of an unknown American soldier who lost his life in the American Revolutionary War.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Defense to provide for the burial at Arlington Memorial Amphitheater, Arlington National Cemetery, Virginia, of the remains of an unknown American soldier who lost his life in the American Revolutionary War.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the burial at the Arlington Memorial Amphitheater, Arlington National Cemetery, Va., of the remains of an unknown American soldier who lost his life in the American Revolutionary War.
